## Constants

<a name="TRACE"></a>

```go
const (
    // Log level constants
    TRACE = iota
    DEBUG
    INFO
    WARNING
    ERROR
    FATAL
    PANIC

    // Color Escape Codes
    Black   = "\033[30m"
    Red     = "\033[31m"
    Green   = "\033[32m"
    Yellow  = "\033[33m"
    Blue    = "\033[34m"
    Magenta = "\033[35m"
    Cyan    = "\033[36m"
    White   = "\033[37m"
    Reset   = "\033[0m"

    // Formatting
    Bold      = "\033[1m"
    Italic    = "\033[3m"
    Underline = "\033[4m"
)
```

## func [LogLevel](<https://github.com/gemini-oss/rego/blob/main/pkg/common/log/log.go#L42>)

func LogLevel(level int) string

String representation for log levels

<a name="Logger"></a>
## type [Logger](<https://github.com/gemini-oss/rego/blob/main/pkg/common/log/log.go#L63-L68>)



```go
type Logger struct {
    Verbosity int // log level {TRACE, DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, FATAL, PANIC}
    // contains filtered or unexported fields
}
```
